coverLetter: I have extensive experience building e-commerce platforms with React and Node.js. I've successfully delivered 15+ similar projects with integrated payment systems and admin dashboards. I can start immediately and guarantee high-quality code with comprehensive testing.

Hello! I'm a full stack developer specializing in e-commerce solutions. I've worked with Stripe, PayPal, and various payment gateways. My approach focuses on scalability and security. I'd love to discuss your project requirements in detail.

I'm excited about this fitness app design project! I have extensive experience designing mobile interfaces and have worked on 5+ fitness-related apps. I'll create modern, engaging designs that enhance user motivation and engagement. My process includes user research, wireframing, and interactive prototypes.
